dialogue: You haven't completed the mandatory class on blockchain.
I'm already an experienced blockchain developer.
Every developer needs to check the box.
Just check the box for me.
Only the instructor can do that.
And I don't want to call him because he rambles on and on.
You want me to take a two-day class so you won't have to make a phone call???
What if taking the class causes me to miss my deadlines?
